headline: Today's Outage Post Mortem
keywords: Post Mortem, BGP, Outage, Hong Kong
description: CloudFlare had an outage across much of our network today. The outage began at 20:19 (GMT). It affected approximately 75% of traffic to CloudFlare's network. The length of time for the outage varied depending on region, but the maximum period of downtime was approximately 15 minutes.
